lyric.chorus: Miagereba Owari wo mita koto mo nai Memai wo oboeru youna ao Ano oka wo koereba Itsumo anata ga ita Sayonara kawaii yume
lyric.verse: Omae wa ii ko da to itoshii koe Sabita kakera tsumiagete Omae no tame da yo to kiss wo kurete Hi wa mata ochi yo ga akeru Massugu waraenai dakedo waratte Watashi no tame dake ni hashireru nara Massugu ni mamoretara
lyric.chorus: Tsunagareta kaze sae ugokihajimeru Misaki ni yasashii ame no ato Tsuyoi hikari wa kage wo kogetsukasete hieta Ai kara sameru youni Miagereba Owari wo mita koto mo nai Memai wo oboeru youna ao Ano oka wo koereba Itsumo anata ga ita Sayonara kawaii yume Tsunagareta kaze sae ugokihajimeru Saki ni yasashii ame no ato tsuyoi hikari wa Kage wo kogetsukasete hieta Ai kara sameru youni Sayonara kawaii yume no nioi

translator.translatorname: Mika Arita, Kazu 'Omi' Kajihara, Marcelluss D. Nealy

lyric.verse: Beyond the wire fence Sun light burns the road as it dies My eyes chased after the unknown fires Sipped the dew of the burning flower I need the power to run away from here I have always been rounded up waiting for that sign
lyric.chorus: When I look up Shines the spacious blue sky With no edge that I've ever seen When I went over that hill You were always there Good-bye sweet dreams
lyric.verse: "You are a good girl" A lovely voice I piled the rusted fragments one upon another "It's for your own good" You gave me a kiss The sun sets again and the night gives birth I can't smile straight but I try to smile I wish I could run only for myself I wish I could save it
lyric.chorus: Even tied up wind starts to move Soft trace of the rain at the cape The strong light burned the shadow and chilled Like awakening from love When I look up Shines the spacious blue sky With no edge that I've ever seen When I went over that hill You were always there Good-bye sweet dreams Even tied up wind starts to move Soft trace of the rain at the cape The strong light burned the shadow and chilled Like awakening from love Good-bye scent of sweet dreams
